description_en: occasion and usage scenarios for bridal and formal wear.
description_zh: 婚纱与正式礼服场合与使用场景。

attributes.description_en: Traditional wedding ceremony, the most formal and important occasion.
attributes.description_zh: 传统婚礼仪式，最正式重要的场合。

attributes.description_en: Wedding reception or celebration party, typically less formal than ceremony.
attributes.description_zh: 婚宴或庆祝派对，通常比仪式更不正式。

attributes.description_en: Celebration of engagement, typically semi-formal to formal.
attributes.description_zh: 订婚庆祝，通常半正式到正式。

attributes.description_en: Pre-wedding celebration for the bride, typically semi-formal.
attributes.description_zh: 新娘婚前庆祝，通常半正式。

attributes.description_en: Pre-wedding celebration for the groom, typically casual to semi-formal.
attributes.description_zh: 新郎婚前庆祝，通常休闲到半正式。

attributes.description_en: Celebration of wedding anniversary, typically formal to semi-formal.
attributes.description_zh: 结婚周年庆祝，通常正式到半正式。

attributes.description_en: Elegant dinner party or formal dining event, typically black-tie.
attributes.description_zh: 优雅晚宴或正式用餐活动，通常黑领结。

attributes.description_en: Charity or fundraising gala, typically very formal and glamorous.
attributes.description_zh: 慈善或筹款晚会，通常非常正式华丽。

attributes.description_en: Formal awards ceremony or recognition event, typically black-tie.
attributes.description_zh: 正式颁奖典礼或表彰活动，通常黑领结。

attributes.description_en: High school or college prom, typically semi-formal to formal.
attributes.description_zh: 高中或大学舞会，通常半正式到正式。

attributes.description_en: Occasions with uneven or off-center design elements.
attributes.description_zh: 带有不均匀或偏心设计元素的场合。

attributes.description_en: Occasions with sheer fabric or mesh overlay.
attributes.description_zh: 带有透明面料或网纱覆盖的场合。

attributes.description_en: Occasions with decorative cutouts or openings.
attributes.description_zh: 带有装饰性镂空或开口的场合。

attributes.description_en: Occasions with soft, draped fabric.
attributes.description_zh: 带有柔软垂坠面料的场合。

attributes.description_en: Occasions with multiple layers or tiers.
attributes.description_zh: 带有多层或分层的场合。

attributes.description_en: Occasions with gathered or pleated fabric.
attributes.description_zh: 带有收褶或打褶面料的场合。

attributes.description_en: Occasions with belt or sash elements.
attributes.description_zh: 带有腰带或饰带元素的场合。

attributes.description_en: Occasions that wrap around the body.
attributes.description_zh: 包裹身体的场合。

attributes.description_en: Occasions with short overskirt or ruffle elements.
attributes.description_zh: 带有短罩裙或荷叶边元素的场合。

attributes.description_en: Clean, simple occasions with minimal details.
attributes.description_zh: 简洁干净的场合，细节最少。

attributes.description_en: Structured, geometric occasions with sharp lines.
attributes.description_zh: 结构化几何场合，线条锐利。

attributes.description_en: Non-traditional occasions with unconventional construction.
attributes.description_zh: 非传统场合，带有非常规结构。

attributes.description_en: One-of-a-kind occasions created through advanced techniques.
attributes.description_zh: 通过高级技术创造的独一无二场合。

attributes.description_en: Occasions that can be altered or adjusted.
attributes.description_zh: 可改变或调整的场合。
